article_headline: Oilers drop Kings^won’t relax oh win
article_text: LAS VEGAS,“ Nev. (API -Marvelous Marvin Hagler and Thomas "Hit Man” Hearns get the chance to back up their boasts Monday , night in this town where talk has always been cheap. They will collide in a scheduled 12-round bout in a sold out, 15,088-seat outdoor-arena, just a shout from the gaming tables at Caesars Palace.
